short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Middle click highlighted text to do a search with that text in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Also, if the text is a URL or a even just a domain (Resource Name), it will go directly to the page.

Check the options menu.

Reload any open tabs after installing this extension for it take effect.

https://github.com/DovieW/middle-click-search
